website_summaries.verdict: A great classic-looking time piece from Timex's lineup with an easy-to-read display.
pros: Leather strap fits comfortably on most wrist sizes without pinching skin
Comes in several different colors to match different preferences
cons: The bulk of the watch is larger than most women's classic timepieces

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Timex for Women
customer_reviews.text: I love Timex watches, especially those with large dials that I can see without glasses. You know what you're getting with the Timex name and I've never been diappointed. I had a man's watch that looked very much like this one but the band was too long and I never found a replacement. This is actually a womans so the strap is perfect. Since it's leather, I will not wear it in situations where I know I will sweat a lot. But it looks nice in other circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: eusrIMHO

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Large numbers! Exactly the kind of watch I had been searching for--easy to read & a light to light up numbers at night. Watchstrap is very comfortable & would fits wrists of all sizes. Well-made. If your eyes are failing somewhat--this is the answer!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Swaft

customer_reviews.title: Timely Happiness!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this watch. It has a larger face that is easy to see. The band fits well and is comfortable. Love the indigo light. I read a couple of reviews which stated the ticking was loud....I don't know what they were talking about. I keep it by my bed and with everything quite I can not hear it ticking. I highly recommend this watch.....I am a fan of Timex.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: 2 legit 2 quit
customer_reviews.text: Literally everything I want in a watch. I have super tiny wrists and was worried it wouldnt fit. I wear this baby on the first hole and it fits perfectly. I've accidentally worn this in some hot springs a few weeks ago. Completely forgot I had it on and it's still ticking away! Love that it lights up, love how small it is. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: miss hailee

customer_reviews.title: Returning this one..
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful watch. Love the color. But it doesn’t always tell time! The watch stops working randomly and starts again when it pleases. The glow function doesn’t work either. Returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer Momma

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Second indaglo watch I’ve purchased in the past 6 months. The last one didn’t keep time from the moment It was opened; which unfortunately for me was after the 30 days return time, as it was a gift. Have always liked the watches in the past so decided to try the easy read version this time. Not much better. Kept time for about a day. Since then it’s been on again off again. What’s especially odd is that the light on both watches work just not keeping time. Very disappointing because I’ve been wearing various versions of timex indaglo watches for over 20 years and this is probably my last purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Jo Kline

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! The band is extremely comfortable, it’s easy to read and the blacklight is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndel Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Waste!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of poop! Not an everyday watch, and in 10 months the band is coming apart, and the glass cracked. For no reason. No memory of it being impacted. It never rests glass side down. Must have been the slightest impact to it. I went to do a warranty claim, but Timex does not warranty it of the glass is cracked. Even without the glass issues, the band will cost me $20 to replace. Or about $10 to ship to Timex. The watch is $30. Not worth the hassle. Total waste of money. Piece of total junk.
customer_reviews.author: JCRam

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my wife. Going with a Timex watch is always a safe bet, you know the watch will be affordable and reliable. I knew my wife would also like the small/petite face on this watch. I would definitely recommend this watch if your looking for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what a docent needs
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. The numbers stand out clearly enough for me to see the time without my reading glasses! I am a volunteer docent at the zoo, and it seemed rude to pull out my cellphone in front of the visitors. Now I can take a quick glance at my wrist to see if it's time to move to the next demonstration. The only minor complaint: our volunteer shirts are red, and I was hoping the watch strap would match. This strap's reddish color tends a little to brown. It doesn't clash with the red shirt, though, so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same watch with a brown band 3 years ago. It's still working. The band is very comfortable and easy to wear. I thought I'd get a white band for the spring. It feels like plastic and very uncomfortable. I'm very disappointed with the band.
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: Like the size.
customer_reviews.text: This small watch, which lights up, and has a very lightweight white leather band is the perfect fit for a small wrist size. I'm pleased! Like it so much that I also purchased the same watch with a red band.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Some "features" of the 40th anniversary edition
customer_reviews.text: Great watch: lightweight, easy-to-read, and classic style with a twist. The red band accent is fun. I first bought a Weekender, but it was too heavy. This watch is lighter and well-proportioned (my wrist is 6.5 in for reference). Only thing I didn't expect was the big "40" in the indigo setting! It doesn't get in the way of reading the time, but it's a little weird, adding numbers to a clock. (Photos included. This review is only for the 40th Anniversary edition with the black/red band).
customer_reviews.author: Gin F.

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, seems to work well and fits great.
customer_reviews.text: One my favorite watches now. I love the band width, and it fits well. The clock face is easy to read and I love the lighting capability since I can just push the button in and see what time it is if it's dark. It does have a rather loud tick, even when the watch isn't next to your face. I also wish it had the day on it, but I am pleased with this product and would buy it again. The quality seems decent for the price and it is clean and classic looking.
customer_reviews.author: PrepGal14526

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Long Band, Pretty Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I found the band size on an eBay auction & bought from here ~ it's 9 inches ~ a GREAT size for us not-so-small-boned women ~ This watch functioned perfectly this past weekend where the light wasn't the best & I had to see the second hand ~ Another good thing, is the black second hand, so you can really see it ~ I like the larger, not too large face & the band is very stylish, too ~ I'm very glad I bought this Timex watch! God bless you all!
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read large ladies watch
customer_reviews.text: The size of this watch is somewhere between a typical ladies watch and a typical mans watch. It is very easy to read and glows at night when you push the stem. I love this feature of Timex watches. The strap on this watch is large, a bit too big for my wrists. It is also stiff. I have had the watch for a couple of weeks and am still waiting for the strap to conform to my wrist. I might get a different strap if this one doesn't work. I lowered my rating from 4 stars to 2 stars because the watch stopped working within less than 1 year and the strapped faded badly.
customer_reviews.author: catwings

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday watch. The numbers are easy to read, and it looks good. The face on this signature edition is a bit larger than some of the other Timex watches that have similar features, so be aware of that. If you like a larger face then this one is for you, but if you want a small petite face then think about getting one of the other ones. The Indiglo feature is really what sold me on the watch. It glows with a nice soft light at night which is not glaring or disturbing but yet light enough to see the dial clearly. Great job on this watch, Timex! It is a classic with style.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: I have really small arms so most watch bands are way too big, the stretchy ones you can't make small enough and the leather ones if you cut them down they don't wear right. This band is perfect, the watch is everything it is advertised as just one little problem, while trying to set the watch back from daylight savings time I had a heck of a time getting the stem to pull out so I could change the time. Overall I would recommend this watch to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Nice Casual Watch
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when I received the watch because the box was basically mutilated. I thought that I received a used watch. Looking closer, it had signs that it was new and did not look worn. I like the watch and it is a good casual watch to wear with jeans. The leather band is nice and is long enough for larger wrists. That being said, when on, the watch has a tendency to shift so it doesn't sit flat on the wrist. Not sure why that is. So for that reason, and the terrible packaging, I'm only giving it four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Previously used product? Leather strap is WAY too long for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: Going to be a Mothers day gift but the watch arrived in padded envelope so the box was smashed. It was sort of like the watch had been used (and returned) previously. I'm thinking it was returned because the leather band was way too long for a woman's wrist. After putting the watch on, the unused band sticks out and catches on sleeves, tabletops, etc. She needed a watch so I apologized for the quality and she cut the band shorter before I could return it. So much for the mother's day gift.............
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! I like it!! Have a stylish one that is too large to sleep on, this is perfect, can leave it on 24/7 and keep enjoying. Happy size, good leather strap, exactly what i needed. Used it 5 months and battery is dead. what can i use to open back to replace battery? battery size? Thank you Update 8/27/18 replaced battery, still no go. starts and stops, always behind. not reliable, should last minimum a year. warranty info? went to watch repair,they said new battery good, watch is not. need a new watch. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Mom

customer_reviews.title: Practical and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy. Out of the box and on my wrist in under 3 minutes. Unboxing- cut 1 plastic tie and gently slide the band over the stays for the arm form. Pulled out starter tab from the pin, adjusted the time by rotating the pin, removed the protective clear film from the face and put it on my wrist. No instructions needed. My wrist is 6.5" and I have it in the 6th out of 10 holes. I like my watches a little lose. I've switched to a leather band because of excema.
customer_reviews.author: AngieSewTherapy

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a timex watch for myself and my husband in December. After several weeks, my watch stopped working so I had a new battery put in it. Well it stopped working again. So I returned it and got a replacement watch. I received it in January and guess what? It stopped working but did not discover it until February 6th, one day after I was eligible to return it. My husband has not had any trouble with his. I do not recommend the women's timex watch if you really need a reliable watch. Very disappointed because I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch at a reasonable price. However, on the gold clasp there is a brighr pink stripe that had somehow bled onto the band in several places. I have no idea why this stripe is there to begin with. I am annoyed at myself for not exchanging it for another one because it bothers me. The band is more of a bugundy/brown color which goes nicely with most outfits. The face is fairly easy to read but I actually prefer a black face.
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Just be aware that the band is narrower than depicted.  Otherwise, Timex watches are the only ones I wear.
customer_reviews.text: Although the band was narrower than depicted, I do like this watch because, as I have a very narrow wrist, this watch is the perfect size as I did not have to punch new holes in the band. I really like Timex Indiglo watches. I wear them all the time and like the indigo feature so I can check the time at night. These watches are a good value and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case diameter is 30mm not 25mm as stated in product description
customer_reviews.text: The diameter of this watch or the watch that was sent to me was not 25mm as listed. It is 30mm. I was trying to replace my old Timex women's Indiglo which is 25mm in diameter when I measured it with calipers. This Timex Women's TW2R30300 Easy Reader Croco looks huge on my wrist by comparison. Unfortunately, the product descriptions for most of the Timex Women's Indiglo say 25mm so it will not be all that helpful in finding a watch that is truly 25mm.
customer_reviews.author: VW.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to read outside that I've had.. best back light too..
customer_reviews.text: As a 60 plus individual that works outside and has to track time, this is the easiest to read yet. The last watch I had was made with silver colored hands.. often I gave up between not having reading lenses on and the lack of contrast with the sun shining on it.. I'd dig out my cell phone out instead. This watch fills the bill PLUS having the best back light of any watch I've had to date. The whole face glows evenly and bright enough for a quick read. Have only had for a week but hoping it keeps on ticking for a long time as my other Timex watches have. Time will tell the tale...
customer_reviews.author: K. J.

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS A HIGH-PERFORMING, AFFORDABLE WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I have used Timex Indiglo watches for the past 15 years. If I wake up during the night, I can press the button and easily see what time it is. If I have to get up during the night, I can press the Indiglo button and face it toward the floor, and it gives me enough light to see where I am going. The bold black numbers in large print, against the white background, is easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: JaneInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch more than my expensive ones. It has everything I need. Indiglo is great when u are in the dark and need to know the time. I can read the numbers with no problem. I buy these Easy Readers all the time because the watchband goes before the watch does and it cost less to replace the whole watch than just the band. I also like the fact that it is water resistant and don't have to worry about washing dishes or showering with it.
customer_reviews.author: BarbNYC

customer_reviews.title: Bummed....
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed - watch died after 4 months. If you want to send it away (going to one of the mailing annexes) for up to 4 weeks and pay ship/handling they will repair. Not too many like being without the watch due to battery issues. Timex lost my longtime business....
customer_reviews.author: butterfly

customer_reviews.title: dead battery/no battery or defective watch?
customer_reviews.text: Watch just arrived. Looks very nice, just what I wanted...except I can't figure out why it's not working. Is the battery missing or is it dead or is the watch the problem? Or do I have to buy the first battery and install it? That's extra money and a lot of trouble. It would be easier to just return it. And buy a different watch. 5 stars if it were working...downgraded because I don't know why it's not working.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Gently pull the stem to set the time
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks, size of the face and wrist band and the feel of the watch on my wrist. After wearing it a week, I realized if I held it to my ear, I could hear it. My only suggestion would be to include instructions on how to use a watch with a stem. I'm old enough to remember wearing an analog watch, a Timex actually. But I think there might be some buyers that have only experienced digital time keepers. Some folks won't know to gently pull the stem to set the time. But unlike the old fashion time keepers, you don't need to wind the stem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: They’re not kidding when they say “Easy To Read”
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch for it’s easy-to-read qualities. It’s bigger than some I’d wear for dress, but timing things with the second hand was important when running chemical tests and seconds count, and on other watches it was too hard for me to see the notches in between the numbers at a glance. This is great for that! There is a smaller version which I also have and wear as an “everyday” watch but when testing, this bigger one is ideal. The “light” feature is nice - I don’t use it much but still nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: StarCat CandyTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Every hour is a number so the spacing and size is great for a person with any sight problems
customer_reviews.text: This watch has a large face on it. Every hour is a number so the spacing and size is great for a person with any sight problems. The band is very attractive. It can be worn casually but also looks very nice with a blazer or a nice dress. I was very pleased with the band size.. This was a wonderful purchase for me. You just can't go wrong with timex. I would recommend it Moms would love this for mothers day
customer_reviews.author: Eckie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first watch I’ve purchased in over 15 years. It’s perfect in every way. I did not want a huge hip hop type watch, but I do need to be able to see what time it is. This watch is fantastic. Just the right size for my thin wrist. I love the whimsical colored numbers & that it lights up! WhoooHooooo! It’s so comfortable on that I keep forgetting that I’m wearing it. Great leather band. Low profile case & crystal. I LOVE this watch. It’s exactly what this 63 yr. old woman needs! It doesn’t look like a kids watch. It really is perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: While I know you can always get the time on your phone I like a good old fashioned watch on my wrist. And I like my watches simple. This watch meets that criteria for me. The face is bigger than the usual womens watch which I really like. The lighted face is great too. The watch band is really attractive and sturdy. Never disappointed with good old Timex!
customer_reviews.author: jfitz

customer_reviews.title: Timex Women's Easy Reader Leather Strap 30mm Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable watch that I prefer to wear because it is sturdy, holds up well (if well cared for), & is easy to read. I take my watch off before washing dishes because I want the band to last longer. These bands are not made of real leather & do not last as long as they did some 30 years ago. Most importantly the watch keeps good time.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Was great for a VERY SHORT TIME. Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This watch was great for the first couple of months - easy to read and comfortable - until I tried to reset the time for the first time and when I pulled out the button on the stem to do so, the entire stem came out of the watch. Of course, I had thrown out the warranty paper and it was past the return time anyway. This Timex didn't take a beating (resetting the time is far from a beating) and didn't keep on ticking. DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Wave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this watch to a friend for her birthday. She loved the summer look of white, the easy to read face, and the light-up feature. And of course, it's a Timex so what more is there to say!
customer_reviews.author: PB Lady

customer_reviews.title: nice looking watch, but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: am a huge timex fan and have worn them all my life. unfortunately, this watch stopped working just past the 90 day warranty. i really liked it. i should have tried to get a replacement but decided to not use a watch. i did try to get it repaired, but couldn't be fixed. really need to start wearing one again, so will reorder in hopes next one will work as my other timex watches have. they usually last many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great Feels Meh
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I have to say I'm pleased with what I got, but I do have some reservations. The appearance of the watch is gorgeous; certainly a classic. The drawbacks are the band and buckle because they feel cheap. It's a very plasticy feeling watch. I'm not sure how long it will last because it does not feel durable like a watch should. You get what you pay for, and it's obvious Timex cut some quality corners on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin & Sam

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this watch!
customer_reviews.text: The face is bigger than I'm used to but I really like my new watch! The time is easy to read and the backlighting is great! Update: 2 years later and I still love this watch, however, I am knocking off (half) a star because we found it impossible to close up the back after replacing the battery! Eventually I found a video online explaining this is a fairly common issue and showing how to replace the back without damaging the crystal. Ok, maybe I shouldn’t remove a star but it just shouldn’t be this difficult!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: So my watch is less than a year old (9 months), and the inside face of the watch has a cloudy finish on it and it’s blurry. The band did not last long either. I have only worn Timex watches and this one is disappointing. My other watches lasted at least two years. I expected more from Timex. I originally gave five stars, the watch is very pretty and I got lots of compliments on it but I need a durable watch.
customer_reviews.author: KellyF

customer_reviews.title: I had an expensive watch for years that looked like this Timex and it had a band just like ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just a short time but it is exactly what I wanted. I had an expensive watch for years that looked like this Timex and it had a band just like this one. I just dropped it on my bathroom floor and it died in a big way. This watch will take its place proudly. I have worn Timex for years and they are great. (The expensive watch was a gift).
customer_reviews.author: sbrown

customer_reviews.title: Stopped telling time within two months.
customer_reviews.text: This watch was delivered a little less than two months ago, and has already stopped working. I reset the time, push the pin back in, and the hands will move for a few minutes and then stop again. I love the look of the watch and usually like Timex, but there’s no reason within two months of having gotten this watch that it should be failing, given the gentle wear it’s been subjected to. The light feature still works perfectly, which makes me believe that it’s not a battery issue. Be cautious in buying, your watch may be a lemon and you may not realize it until just after the return period ends.
customer_reviews.author: Josie May

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is keeping time properly and I like the band. I think the band will wear well. When using the indiglo, the number 40 appears. I like Timex especially the Easy Reader feature for those of us who need it, their watches are reasonably priced and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Mine had an issue
customer_reviews.text: An attractive watch and just the color I wanted. The watch has a thing under the stem to keep it from running until it is purchased. Normally the piece of plastic simply pulls out. This watch had a plastic thing that went all the way around the stem. I had to use fine scissors to remove it. I hope this was a fluke because the stem would not push in when the device was removed. As I said I hope this was a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Made
customer_reviews.text: This could have been a nice watch, but when you set the time, the flimsy knob will pull right out. I managed after some time to get it back in to set the time, but it was obviously broken. I bought this for my Mom in memory care because it will fit her very small wrist. Very disappointed in this Timex product. The other features were fine, just a cheaply made watch. I've had more luck with drugstore watches!
customer_reviews.author: Pizzapiepan

customer_reviews.title: Too big for my small wrist
customer_reviews.text: My intentions for this watch was for everyday use. It appeared to be exactly the same as my Timex that died...30mm, leather band, easy to read, etc, It was not. The face was larger and the strap longer for my small wrist and hand. I was disappointed as it is a beautiful watch. I realize , too, that watches today have much bigger faces which are not appealing to me and rather cumbersome on my wrist. Fortunately, I found a Timex just like my old one so all ended well.
customer_reviews.author: shopping grandma

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry you ordered this Timex Women's Classic watch
customer_reviews.text: Timex Women's T2N954 Elevated Classic Watch is just what I have been looking the longest time for. All these years I have used a women's Timex watch with backlight, minute markings on watch, and date, but the date has usually been wrong, and the old straps I had were wider. This watch looks so feminine and delicate on my wrists. I also love the blue color. I didn't think I would look good in goldtone as I have also always used silvertone. The watch looks good on me that's all I've got to say. It is perfect just the way it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I always buy Timex
customer_reviews.text: This is not a dressy watch; it looks just like the picture. It looks just fine with sports clothes and casuals though. Timex is a great brand. I've been wearing their watches for 50 years. Once I found out about the Indiglo feature I have bought only models that feature it, some casual, some dressy. In poor light I can always check the time easily. I never want to be without that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, inexpensive watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch gets the job done. We work on a ranch and it doesn't pay to wear expensive watches as they get scratched up. This watch has withstood more jarring and vibration than most people would subject their watch to and it is keeping perfect time. The easy to read dial makes it easy to read when trotting on a horse! The light makes it easy to see in low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: T. Norris

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Love my watch
customer_reviews.text: The larger face and thicker band took a little time to adjust to but I love it now. It's so simple, and easy... exactly the way I like my watch to be. I goes with everything and I'll buy it again when I loose this one or when the battery quits. Love Timex, been wearing a Timex watch since I was 15 years old. Simple face, comfortable and attractive leather band, and made well, with an unbeatable price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this watch, the material hasn't peeled off like my other watch. Looks great on my very small wrist. And it doesn't have that leathery scent.
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Always love Timex Indiglo
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Timex Indiglo watches for years. They are tough, readable, reliable, attractive timepieces. I was surprised by this one because in the description I failed to notice the size of the watchface which is larger than I had used in the past. I will certainly keep it and use it for “everyday” (and am especially happy with the red leather band) but might go back and order a second, smaller watch for “dress.” Or maybe not since I am quite pleased with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: A cute gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and it was a very pretty watch. My sister liked it. The box it came in was a dented cardboard box. Not exactly cute packaging. My sister did not mind so it did not take away from the product. It functions perfectly. The hands turn, the battery is functioning, and the light turns on. The color is beautiful and I kind of want to purchase the pink one for myself. I would recommend it to anyone that does not yet own a watch.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for her birthday and she loves it. The easy to read dial is a big plus for her since now she can see the time without her reading glasses. Looks good on her wrist and best of all, it's a Timex! She's gotten it wet while doing dishes with no problems. The other watches she was getting would usually die after a week or so but this one is still ticking after a year and a half. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Problem is, every now and again, it stops working for at least a half hour. When reset it works until the next stoppage.
customer_reviews.author: Tatertot

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing reliability
customer_reviews.text: Watch worked fine for two months then it gained two hours ,reset watch , next day same thing , then it stopped. Very disappointed 😞
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as always
customer_reviews.text: It's a Timex - I try others but keep coming back. I have never had a problem with this brand. This particular watch is attractive, light weight, so easy to wear and keeps perfect time. I ordered the blue band and so far (about a month), I've noticed no wear or fading ... I wear it day and night but not in water. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this watch..built in light, easy to read,and water resistance. The only thing about this watch that I do not like is the fact I can hear each tick of the second hand. It is loud!! Maybe it is something they can work on. Other than that, it is exactly what I was looking for. Because of the noise, I gave it a 4 instead of a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: David Gardner

customer_reviews.title: dead after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Watch is dead after 4 months. Not a battery problem. It's just a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: emmapeel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY TIMEX WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I found a watch that is comfortable on my wrist and has indiglo light plus leather strap in the brown leather I like and feels effortless to wear day and night. This is my 2nd one in exactly this style and was delighted to find it is still available. The first one needs a new battery but I am unable to get to a jeweler with the Covid 19 virus risk, so bought a 2nd one while waiting however long it will take to mingle in crowds again. I like the look or the watch as well as the comfort and have used the indiglo light to navigate in the dark when necessary. Love My Watch!
customer_reviews.author: Elinor B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a celebrity wearing this watch
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a celebrity wearing this watch. Love the red; love the dial; love the gosh darn thing so much, I have been wearing it everyday. I highly recommend this product. I have purchased Timex watches in the past, which were normally stretch type. I recently gave my original Mickey Mouse watch to a great-nephew and realized, I like the look of a regular watch with a band one can adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Maxwell-Mood, Ed.D

customer_reviews.title: Lacked Functional Band
customer_reviews.text: The clasp on the band arrived defective. The metal designed to go throw the holes to size the band was too short for the purpose. This could have been discovered by looking closely at it. The band arrived worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: It's BIG
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Timex watches. They are cheap (which is good since I lose or damage them more often than you'd think). I got this one to replace one that I lost, and I thought I was ordering the same thing, but this one has a MUCH bigger face. It's okay and I'll get used to it, but it's really big, so make sure that's what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mum and she loved it! Small, neat with great finishes. I would submit a pic if she would take it off. The straps look and feel like real leather and it actually has a cute back light when you press the timing spool in, which was unexpected. Came ready with batteries but they didnt run until you removed a piece of plastic from the spool. Lets see how this lasts, but for the price, GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: This watch is nicer than shown
customer_reviews.text: The actual watch looks much better than in the picture. It's easy too read and just the right size, neither too large nor too small. It's pretty without being overly conservative. I assume that it will be reliable because it's made by Timex, but I've only had it a short while so I don't know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MSL

customer_reviews.title: Stem pulled out completely when I tried to set the time the first time
customer_reviews.text: There is a plastic "spacer" when the watch arrives. I removed that and attempted to set the watch to the current time and the entire stem pulled out. I had been debating a new watch or a band for an existing watch. This issue pretty much made the decision for me. I know things like this happen, but this is a good brand and something so simple should not cause a problem. I'm returning it and not replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi

customer_reviews.title: Everything watch says it s.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful watch! Just what I wanted. The face numbers in black Print are easy to read. Push the button and watch lights up For easy reading , for night too. The band is soft flexible modern with enough Adjustments for wrist sizes. Would/will order again for a gift or extra for Myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read copy closer than I did
customer_reviews.text: I love Timex Indiglo watches and have probably bought more than 20! But I didn't notice that this one has the number 40 superimposed over view of what time it is when you click the Indigo light button. It makes it harder to read and I don't especially like the number 40! Otherwise a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Cruikshank

customer_reviews.title: TIMEX WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I GOT THE WATCH TODAY AND LOVED IT, EXCEPT I THOUGHT IT WAS GOING TO BE MORE OF A BRUSHED TONED DOWN GOLD INSTEAD OF A BRIGHT GOLD. THE WATCH IN THE PICTURE DOESNT LOOK LIKE THE ONE I RECD. I REALLY LIKE THE ONE IN THE PICTURE. I LOVE THE BIG FACE AND THE INDIGO REALLY MAKES IT EASY TO SEE. THE BAND IS LITTLE BIG, BUT THAT'S OK. 041713 decided to return watch. the picture and the watch did not match and was way to gold for me. ordered different watch in silver with fantastic help of a csr named michelle.
customer_reviews.author: susan larson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: As a woman of a certain age, it is wonderful to see large numbers and not have to squint. Also the blue light that appears when a button is pushed is great, especially in dark surroundings. Also very comfortable. However I find the round face of the watch is too large for my wrist. Maybe this will take getting used to, don’t know. Pretty pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Great durable watch
customer_reviews.text: I wear it every day (been 6 months now) and it is still working great! Does not have any scratches on the face....and I am definitely not careful with it. I like that the face is smaller, because I have small wrists and larger watches look comical on me. I was worried about the pink, but it is a nice subtle color that doesn't scream girly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOW TO REPORT INCOMPLETE DELIVERY ?
customer_reviews.text: Timex Women's TW2R63300 Easy Reader 30mm Black Croco Pattern Leather Strap Watch HOW MAY I REPORT AN INCOMPLETE DELIVERY ? I RECEIVED MY ORDER OR TWO(2) TIMEX WATCHES, THE BROWN BAND WATCH WAS PERFECT... BUT THIS TIMES: Timex Women's TW2R63300 Easy Reader 30mm Black Croco Pattern Leather Strap Watch. (DID NOT HAVE A BACK OR BATTERY INSTALLED. BOTH SAID "INSPECTED." BUT THE BACK WAS MISSING & NOT TO BE FOUND IN THE BOX OR PAPERS. THERE WAS NO DAMAGE TO THE DELIVERY BOX. STRANGE.?? I WOULD BE VERY HAPPY TO REVEIVE A "COMPLETE" Timex Women's TW2R63300 Easy Reader 30mm Black Croco Pattern Leather Strap Watch. THANK YOU. DR. JAMES SCOTT JHSCOTT@SPRYNET.COM
customer_reviews.author: JAMES SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Loving this watch X2
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. I bought it as a Christmas gift for a fellow teacher/friend. We teach in a place where cell phones are not allowed so having a watch is essential. She really likes it, I know, because when I offered her the gift card for exchange, her eyes got big and she threw it in the trash lol
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: What a deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with knowing the time when I wake at night and I was using my cell phone, which at times caused me to stay awake. This watch is perfect, I check the time and fall back asleep. It's stylish and have had complements on how the watch works, and I know it's Timex, so it is waterproof and very durable. Thank you me for the great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina T.

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: This replaces a smaller, but similar Timex. I like the large, clear numbers and the Indiglo backlighting. The price is reasonable, too. However, I'm having trouble adjusting to the larger size - the band is longer as well. This watch would work better for a larger boned person.
customer_reviews.author: J S

customer_reviews.title: Love the indiglo and easy to read face.
customer_reviews.text: I had one like this, that I mutilated, after I replaced the battery, as I was trying to put the back on. I highly recommend getting it done by your local fred meyer or Wal-Mart, or anywhere that has a jeweler. It's got that great indiglo light I love and easy to read time-face. It's simple, but it functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HerGrooviness

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Hate to say it, but Got it out of the box, pulled the stem to set the time. The stem pulled completely out. Poorest quality of watch I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Proportioned nicely for a lady and you can read it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how often I reach for this watch. It's proportioned nicely for a lady and looks great in a work setting. You can see the time easily by a quick glance. It keeps time very accurately. I didn't expect to love it so much- I'd rather have this than some fancy digital watch. If you need an everyday dependable watch, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: JanieO

customer_reviews.title: Used watch when I wanted a new one
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty obvious that Amazon has sent you a used watch when the packaging is all willy-nilly and the hands are already moving. As to this specific watch ... it is simple, it has a light, it's easy to read, the band is plainish and long enough to go around my big wrist. It's just what I wanted, and I'd certainly keep it if it were new. Since it's not, I'm sending it back for an exchange. Hope I get a new one this time!
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy a Timex watch
customer_reviews.text: The watch stopped working two days after the return window ended. I called Timex for support and waited on hold for at least a half hour before giving up. This is the second Timex watch I purchased that has failed. The other watch failed after a few months, I paid the repair fee and sent it to Timex to be fixed. Upon return it worked for one week before it failed. I was a fool to try again. This used to be a reliable product, but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Shopalot

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Timex watches because they work and not overpriced. This watch is no exception. I love the face size so I can read the time easier and having the Indiglo light is important to me. The wrist band is also very nice. All is well made and looks nice on.
customer_reviews.author: Roise

customer_reviews.title: Buy this watch new. Not used.
customer_reviews.text: I ha been buying this same Timex watch for years. I love the Indigo light. The ONLY reason I gave this one 3 stars are because the battery was DOA. I bought it as used thinking about what could possibly be wrong with it. Lesson learned. I Will not be buying anything as used again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Siem

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quality timex with indiglo light.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and love the indigo back light for easy reading at night. Thought the watch face would be a little bit larger based on the photos and that was what I was looking for but it's not. I bought the white band with rose gold. It goes with everything and I'm keeping it. Can't lose with a Timex. I've worn them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Luvs Frogs

customer_reviews.title: Lovely. Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect. I have a small wrist & was worried the “face” might be too large, but it is not. This would also be perfect for someone with a larger wrist as well. The strap is genuine leather and softly lined. I love the entire “12 hours” on face of watch & not the “date in place of the third hour”. A well made watch for casual attire.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE WATCH!
customer_reviews.text: I have many watches but most are too dressy. I just wanted an everyday watch to wear to the doctors and grocery shopping. This is perfect. Just enough gold to wear with a gold bracelet and look classy. Especially love the soft pink color. I am so very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch east to read!!
customer_reviews.text: I had gone without a watch for about 6 months and finally decided to buy one that I could read. This looked large enough and it was! It is the perfect watch!! I don't believe you would ever go wrong with Timex! I love that at night I can push the stem and the dial lights up! It's easy to read and I think quite stylish! Thanks Timex and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Shush*

customer_reviews.title: Needs better packaging!!!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is okay, but I guess you get what you pay for! My nephew is not working right now because of an injury and on a limited budget. He wanted to get this watch for his mother. The packaging was horrible and the watch box was smashed. I had to find a box to put it in to wrap it and make it look presentable. If you are purchasing the watch for yourself great, but if it is intended to be a gift, forget about it! VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Persephone

customer_reviews.title: Great watch but bad band
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. It's classic, it's simple and easy to read and looks professional. However there is no way the band is leather. It's been just a few months and the top is peeling ....
customer_reviews.author: Magalic

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this every day for 9 months - I love it. The strap is wearing and looks pretty grotty, but it is very pale...I’ll definitely need to get a new strap soon. The dial is easy to read without being too big; I have thin wrists and it fits well without looking huge on me.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Got it in September, started losing time in December
customer_reviews.text: So I really liked this watch when I got it, but within 2.5 months, it started losing time. I'm not talking a few minutes either. Right now it's 3 hours and 40 minutes behind. I've always found Timex to be pretty reliable, but this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Nice little watch in a very nice colour, but it ticks loudly.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it were slightly smaller - 28mm or 26mm model would be nice. Wish you could buy replacement straps easily, as the colours are the unique parts that make this particular watch. Wish it wasn't quite so loud (it's really quite loud for an analogue watch, as others have indicated). Apart from that, it's a solid little watch that looks great and functions well.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Humm

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully it's just the battery that needs replacing
customer_reviews.text: The watch doesn't tell time. It may be it needs a new battery. I just haven't had time to get it fixed. There are no stores nearby where I can have the battery changed. It reminded me of the watch stolen from me years ago, and I needed a new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to update this review. liked the watch but after owning this since 12/27/2019 the watch band is separating from the front and back. Disappointing since this product didn't last very long. Seems to be a cheap band. Going to contact Amazon .
customer_reviews.author: hug your earth

customer_reviews.title: Not great for slim wrists but otherwise pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Band is really stiff. Watch face is super heavy so it keeps spinning round my wrist awkwardly. These features make it not great comfort wisw if you have slim wrists, as I do. But its easy to read and very pretty. Quality is better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working & zero help from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 9 days after Amazons return date. Contacted support & all they wanted to do is have me buy a battery for a new watch, that might not even fix it. Otherwise I have to go thru process of dealing with Timex warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It has enough holes in the pretty band for my tiny wrist, a large face that's easy to read, and it's even water-resistant. The only thing it's missing is the date, which I would love to have. For the price, this is an awesome watch.
customer_reviews.author: Hyndsight

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, functionable and I can see it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite watch in many years. It is a reliable brand, fits comfortably on my (hard to size) wrist, and I can read the face without wearing reading glasses. Love this! I don't wear it while doing water activities, so I cannot answer to its water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: invisible

product_meta.title: Timex Women's Easy Reader Leather Strap 30mm Watch
product_meta.description:
The direct descendant of our 1960s televised torture test survivors, today's Easy Reader is as durable as it is classically cool.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :5 x 5 x 0.7 inches; 0.96 Ounces
 * Item model number :TW2R30300
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :October 20, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Timex
 * ASIN :B00IMB7JTE

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #8,201 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #4432 inWomen's Shops 
    *  #10 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars2,002 ratings The direct descendant of our 1960s televised torture test survivors, today's Easy Reader is as durable as it is classically cool.
feature_bullets: Adjustable brown croco 14 millimeter genuine leather strap fits up to 7.5-inch wrist circumference
Cream easy-to-read dial with full Arabic numerals
Silver-tone 30 millimeter brass case with mineral glass crystal
Water resistant to 30 meter (100 feet): In general, withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or bathing
